title: The CEO

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- After an evil player is sent to Urinetown, the next day you may reveal as The CEO. You may Promote a player each day, in addition to the typical promotion vote.
- Lobby: Can only be used if Revealed. During the day, choose a player. The next night, it becomes illegal to visit them (they are untargetable for the night).

desc:
Post 4497
*UGC, or "Urine Good Company", is a megacorporation which owns every private restroom in the world. People must pay to use public amenities. Lobbied laws ensure that peeing anywhere other than these designated amenities is severely punished, often by sending these felons to Urinetown.*
